entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
